body.name: Skoy Scrub, 2-Pack , Non-Scratching, Reusable Scrub for Kitchen and Household Use, Environmentally Friendly, Dishwasher Safe - Assorted Colors and Designs

Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 10 hrs 58 mins
features: Reusable and Long-lasting Dish Scrub: A new concept in kitchen scouring pads, the Skoy Scrub is a reusable scrub made from cotton and a food grade non-toxic hardener that outlasts traditional scrubbers

Replace Traditional Scouring Pads: Replace the old green scouring pads or scrub sponges with these colorful and trendy Skoy Scrubs. These long-lasting and environmentally friendly scrubs will help you save money and control waste
Easy to Clean: The kitchen scrubber can be easily cleaned in the dishwasher. If food particles are caught in the scrub, simply rub the scrub against itself.
Safe on Most Surfaces: The Skoy Dish Scrub is safe for use on non-stick pans, ceramic, glass, and cooktops. The reusable scrub is not limited to the kitchen and works well on most surfaces
Fun Colors and Designs: The Skoy Scrub comes in assorted colors & designs. The colorful and trendy Skoy Scrubs add fun as well as function to the kitchen.
Sustainable Product: The Skoy Scrub is made from remnant fibers from the toweling industry. These fibers would have ended up in the landfill if we did not rescue them.

Skoy Scrub Uses: Kitchens * Boats * Porcelain * Glass * Sinks * Stovetops * Offices * Stainless Steel * Cast Iron * Camping * Countertops * Pans * Grout * Floors * Vegetables * Fridge * Pans * Garage * Auto * Windshields * Hard Water Deposits * Tiles * Marble * And More
body.description: Color:Assorted | Size:2-Pack The Skoy Scrub is a new concept in kitchen scouring pads. This reusable scrub made in Europe (Poland) from cotton (98%) and non-toxic hardener (2%) outlasts traditional scrubbers and in turn saves money and controls waste. The Skoy Scrub comes in a variety of colors and designs which adds fun as well as function to any kitchen. These scrubs will replace the old green scouring pads or scrub sponges. The Skoy Scrub is not limited to the kitchen and works well on most surfaces. The scrubber is easily cleaned on the top rack of the dishwasher. Each Skoy scrub is about 5″ x 6″.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Everyday Cleaning made simple… with the environment in mind Multi-purpose Scrub Use on Pots and Pans Clean Stoves and Counters Washable & Reusable Made in Poland The Skoy Kitchen Scrub Long-lasting and Durable The Skoy Scrub is a new concept in kitchen scouring pads. This reusable scrub, made in Poland from cotton and a non-toxic hardener, outlasts traditional scrubbers and in turn saves money and controls waste, a common theme with all of the Skoy products. The Skoy Scrub comes in a variety of colors and designs so pretty that you almost want to wear them. The Skoy Scrub is not limited to the kitchen and works well on most surfaces. The scrubber is easily cleaned on the top rack of the dishwasher. Skoy Scrub is Made from Remnant Cotton Fibers from the Toweling Industry Non-toxic Hardener 98% Cotton and 2% Resin Replaces Traditional Scouring Pads and Brushes Non-scratching on most surfaces Long-lasting and Durable Easily cleaned on the Top Rack of the Dishwasher

Easy to Clean The Skoy Scrub is easily cleaned on the top rack of the dishwasher. If food particles get caught in the scrub, simply rub the scrub against itself and voila - its sorted! Fun Colors and Designs The Skoy Scrub comes in fun colors and designs adding fun as well as function to the kitchen. Time to toss out those old ugly green scouring pads or scrub sponges that you have to hide under your sink. Colors may vary due to the use of remnant fibers from the toweling industry. Multi-use Scrub The Skoy Scrub is safe on most surfaces including non-stick pans, ceramic stovetops and glass. It is not limited to the kitchen and works well on most surfaces. NOTE: NOT for use on delicate surfaces.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are the best kitchen scrubbers
reviews.reviewText: These things work really well AND they’re machine washable. I have had one set for 3-4 years now and they are only just now starting to wear out a little bit. These things are sturdy and easy to use. I even give them as gifts (for the right people / occasion of course) since they are such good tools.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Environmentally friendly. It’s made out of cotton and a non toxic hardner making for less waste and saving money. Super cute. Works GREAT. Easy to clean in the top rack of the dishwasher. This is the 3rd time I’ve bought these in about 5 years, so they last. Definitely worth the money and great for reducing waste.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I'm not someone who generally reviews things unless they're really good or really bad. In thise case, they're REALLY GOOD!I first bought this set (4 cloths 2 scrubbers) in February of 2020. To be honest I was purchasing something else at the time that was really inexpensive and would only ship for free if you added it to an order. I needed some new dish cloths so after reading reviews on some different ones I landed on these.Over the last 5 years I've been trying to do away with as many single use products as possible because I hate waste, unnecessary trash, etc. I've been using an old fashioned style safety razor to shave for about 4 years now because the blades are insanely cheap, recyclable, and there's no plastic cartridges, plastic handles, etc. I bought a pack of washable/reusable cotton rounds so I no longer buy normal cotton rounds or balls anymore. I have mesh drawstring bags that I take grocery shopping for produce instead of using the plastic bags hanging in the produce section. Aside from needing to add something to get free Prime shipping I decided on these because they're reusable, machine washable, and had 2 scrubbers included.I really wasn't expecting much. I mean, a dish cloth is a dish cloth right? WRONG!I used my first cloth in February 2020 and literally used that same one for 9 or 10 months. Whenever I ran the dishwasher I would stick the cloth and scrubber in there to clean them and if I wasn't using the dishwasher I just threw them into the washing machine. I honestly cannot believe how strong, durable, and long lasting these things are! After 10ish months I wore a hole in the cloth while scrubbing my cheese grater and not paying attention. Once I wore the hole in it I retired it from dishes and used it for cleaning around the house. I then grabbed one of the 3 cloths left, used that for dishes/kitchen counters. I gave a 3rd cloth away to a friend after telling her she had to try them. We purchased a new house and moved in December 2020 and somehow I lost my cloth with the hole and the one I was using for the kitchen so I only had one left. I started using it the day we moved in 12.07.2020 and wore a little hole in it today scrubbing something rough in the sink.I really cannot say enough great things about these cloths. They're strong, durable, and last pretty much forever. Once they get a little worn out (if ever) I just use them for cleaning around the house. When this new set comes I'm going to retire the 4th of my original pack to be a bathroom cleaning cloth.The scrubbers are just as if not more durable than the cloths. I gave my friend one of the two scrubbers when I gave her the cloth. That means I've been using my one scrubber since Feb 2020 and it still works as well as the day I opened it.I forgot to mention that these are great for wiping up spills as they're super absorbent.I'm sorry that this review is all over the place and long winded.Tl;dr - The cloths and scrubbers are great, durable, absorbent, have a ton of uses, and can be thrown in the washing machine or dishwasher. Do yourself a favor and buy some!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can’t believe how effective these are
reviews.reviewText: These attractive scrubbers are really effective at removing even the toughest burnt-on food from pots and pans . They work better than the scrubbers with sponges on the back - no more smelly, sodden, germ-laden items near the sink. They are safe to use on all types of pans and stove-tops; I’ve never had one do any damage to any surface in the 2 years I’ve been using them. And when you think they need a bit of freshening up, they go in the dishwasher. They are not absorbent so they are no good for surface wiping, I use a Swedish dishcloth for that

reviews.reviewTitle: Great scrubbers, easy on non-stick surfaces
reviews.reviewText: Easy to rinse, long lasting and they do not stink even after months of use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: my husband does the washing up and he loves them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 30, 2023

reviews.reviewText: Received today. Came to Germany from thr US. Havent used yet, but product seems good. Will update review if this turns out to be false.Whats ironic is that it is Made in Germany but wasnt available for purchase locally or through a local seller on Amazon. Think of the carbon footprint this delivery leaves even though its a product made in Deutschland. Deducted 1 star only because of this reason. Shopping sustainable doesnt seem productive at the end of this whole saga.
